scripts.makeDirs: mkdir -p cimmenu/templates/generated/attributes/cgmes && mkdir -p cimmenu/lib && mkdir -p cimsvg/lib && mkdir -p dist
scripts.cimmenu_base: cd cimmenu && npm install && node templates/generateCgmesTemplates.js && cp templates/packageIndex.js ../cimsvg/src
scripts.cimsvg: cd cimsvg && npm install && npm run build
scripts.cimmenu: cd cimmenu && npm install && npm run build
scripts.libs: npm run cimmenu_base && npm run cimsvg && npm run cimmenu
scripts.generateIndex: node generateIndex.js $(npm config get mode) > index.html
scripts.build-tasks: npm run makeDirs && npm run libs && npm run generateIndex && npm run makeDist && npm run test
scripts.build: npm config set mode production && npm run build-tasks
scripts.build-dev: export ROLLUP_FLAGS=' --sourcemap inline'; export ESLINT_FLAGS=' --rule no-console:off '; npm config set mode development && npm run build-tasks
scripts.test: node test/runTests.js && npm run lint && npm run ctlint
scripts.lintfix: eslint --fix index.js cimsvg/*.js cimsvg/src/*.js cimmenu/*.js cimmenu/src/*.js ${ESLINT_FLAGS}
scripts.lint: eslint index.js cimsvg/*.js cimsvg/src/*.js cimmenu/*.js cimmenu/src/*.js ${ESLINT_FLAGS}
